DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to test whether Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD) patients that participate in a Stress Reduction Intervention show a brain activation pattern (assessed by MRI) indicative of improved emotion regulation compared to an active control intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Stress Reduction and Anxiety: Effects on the Function and Structure of the Brain
DOC.criteria: participation in the study 'Stress Reduction Techniques and Anxiety: Therapeutic and Neuroendocrine Effects" by Dr. Elizabeth Hoge metallic implants left handed epileptic seizures head trauma weight over 350 pounds claustrophobia
